Doom hammer was an enchanted maul, a "bringer of that which it is," found in the Western Heartlands of Faer√ªn in the late 15 century DR.
Each successful strike with a doom hammer sent a deathly chill of impending doom down the targets bones. This condition prevented them from healing and stiffened their limbs enough to make it harder to aim and attack.
In the , doom hammer was in the hands of Grat the Trader, a goblin of the Cult of the Absolute. The weapon itself was looted from nearby locales targeted by the cult.
